title: minerjones

content: For your consideration are 3 products from maker Ballet:LOT 1: Ballet PURE Limited Edition Box Set #4*More information: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5329928LOT 2: Ballet "Cardsmiths" branded 0.01BTC LOADED Redemption Reward wallet + Cardsmiths "Redeemed" cardLOT 3: Ballet LTC Block wallets x2: #284 & #285 (BOTH REDEEMED)*Will work on a LIFO system where you bid on the number of items and then the bid per item:  1 @ xxBTC, 2 @ xxBTCSTARTING BID LOT 1: 0.0110BTCSTARTING BID LOT 2: 0.0100BTCSTARTING BID PER CARD LOT 3: 0.0016BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER ITEM: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 18th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
